about_the_game:
Gather all 6, and you can make any wish come true with the [Dragoon Ball].

You become the talking snake, [Snake Boy], defeat enemies, and use the skill cards you steal from them to build a stronger deck.

Complete your journey to fulfill your wish with the ultimate deck and uncover the secrets of the world!

1. Attack the enemy with an attack card!

Attack cards deal direct damage to the enemy.

They are generally classified into [Single Attack], which targets one enemy, [Multi-hit Attack], which deals multiple hits at once, and [Area Attack], which targets multiple enemies simultaneously.

Depending on the card’s attribute, they can deal [Physical / Magic / Composite] damage.

﻿

﻿2. Strengthen your strategy with support cards!

﻿Support cards allow you to use various effects that assist in battle.

In addition to simple buffs, debuffs, and healing that support the battle, you can also perform more strategic plays such as searching for desired cards or disrupting the enemy's actions.

﻿

﻿3. Counter the enemy's actions with a counter card!

Counter cards are cards that can be activated by chaining to [a specific action of the enemy] during their turn.

They usually have effects that disrupt the enemy's actions or provide significant advantages, allowing you to more effectively counter the enemy's strategy.

﻿

﻿4. Try using an Annihilation card with powerful effects!

﻿Annihilation cards are cards that disappear upon use, making them difficult to recycle, but they come with stronger effects.

While powerful on their own, their ability to disappear upon use allows you to compress your deck, making it easier to add the desired skills to your hand.

﻿

﻿5. Use trigger and passive effects to expand your strategic options!

﻿Some cards have trigger effects that can be activated when sent to the hand, deck, or graveyard.

Additionally, there are passive effects that continuously activate when the card is in specific locations like the deck, hand, or graveyard.

Use these special effects to think about the synergy between cards and strengthen your strategy!﻿

﻿6. Combine several cards to create a Union card with the strongest effects!

﻿During battle, you can combine several cards from your hand to synthesize a Union card with powerful effects.

Prepare the materials and synthesize the ultimate card to defeat your enemies!

﻿1. Earn experience to enhance your stats and acquire powerful traits!

Defeat enemies to level up and earn stat and trait points.

Use the stat points to strengthen your character and spend the trait points to unlock special abilities!

﻿

﻿2. Strengthen your strategy by using items and artifacts!

﻿Equip [items] that can be purchased from the shop and [artifacts] that can be obtained by defeating enemies to your quick slots, enhancing your battle support and expanding your strategic options!

﻿1. Analyze the characteristics of your enemies, strategize, and break their patterns!

Each enemy uses unique traits and cards.

Analyze the enemies' information, strategize, and break their patterns!

﻿

﻿2. Embark on an adventure across the world, defeat enemies, and complete your journey to fulfill your wish!

﻿Who is Snake Boy, and what happened in the past?

Defeat the enemies blocking your path, progress through the story, and listen to the exciting tale of Snake Boy's adventure!

﻿

﻿3. Enjoy card battles with enemies you create yourself in the training ground!

﻿In the training ground, you can customize the [stats] and [deck] of the enemies you've defeated.

Create the strongest enemies and enjoy card battles beyond the limits!

﻿

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better

name: Re:SSS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Collect all six Dragoonballs to make any wish come true. Play as Snake Boy, a talking snake, defeat enemies, and steal their skill cards to build a stronger deck. Complete your journey with the ultimate deck, fulfill your wish, and uncover the secrets of the world!
